rows.label: tlk70000020_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm a retired old man now, but
I've been thinking about helping
Wotta build new ships.

rows.label: tlk70000020_04_msg0002
rows.name:
It's not just that he was my apprentice.
I feel a duty to use my skills to protect
the future of the Iiran people.

rows.label: tlk70000020_04_msg0003
rows.name:
It's likely that this will be my
life's last work, both as a
shipwright and as an individual.

rows.label: tlk70000020_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Perhaps I'm more energetic than is
suitable for someone my age. Ohoho!
